biotools.summary: EPViz is a tool to aid researchers in developing, validating, and reporting their predictive modeling outputs. A lightweight and standalone software package developed in Python, EPViz allows researchers to load a PyTorch deep learning model, apply it to the EEG, and overlay the output channel-wise or subject-level temporal predictions on top of the original time series.
